Reviews.Title: Great choice for mom
Reviews.Author: VV F
Reviews.Content: I purchased this cell phone for my mom. My mom really likes it. Rings are loud and front is big enough.The color is beautiful.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Cell Phone!
Reviews.Author: Philip H. Ness
Reviews.Content: I have used Motorola Razr V3 cell phones for years, but have had some problems with the last two, so I thought I would try this Samsung.  It has better battery life, works well without a case, and is relatively easy to use the menu.  Receiving and making calls is very easy.  I use it in Europe, Asia and America.  I like it better than the Razrs and would definitely buy another one.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone
Reviews.Author: jax8894
Reviews.Content: I purchased my phone from Hasslefree @ Amazon and it is phone is perfect for me. It is easy to use and the keys are large which is what I needed. It works well with my prepaid service. I will buy another one in the future. The color is my favorite.

Reviews.Title: Pretty in pink
Reviews.Author: Pompeii999
Reviews.Content: Prettiest phone I ever owned. Downside,very bad selection of ring tones, had to pick one that sounded like it was from 1940 Poland.Also,no screen on cover to tell you the time or caller info but i knew that from the get go.All else was what I expected from a basic phone and I love it! I received the phone in record breaking time with everything I needed if I wanted to return it.I ampleased with the purchase and Polka every time my phone rings.....

Reviews.Title: Beautiful practical phone, simple to use
Reviews.Author: Kawerimidde
Reviews.Content: As many reviewers have said, this is a nice phone. Simple in its offering and i think best for those who are not looking for a wide range of applications on phones. Its for my mother who insisted on a samsung flip phone and i could not find anything better.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone
Reviews.Author: Ann
Reviews.Content: Was looking for a basic phone, no easy task these days, and this phone is perfect.  Good sound, durable, nice looking and easy to use.  Great for those who like to keep it simple

Reviews.Title: Good basic phone.
Reviews.Author: Bostonian "PDo"
Reviews.Content: This is a good basic phone for a user who needs to make and to receive calls only.  The user can buy a SIM card to activate the phone line and to pay as you use along.  I myself found that is more acceptable than signing a contract with the phone company in term of costs.

Reviews.Title: I loved the pink.
Reviews.Author: New User
Reviews.Content: It is a very good phone for the price.One of the best looking phones. I gifted this mobile to my mother. It looks awesome. She loved it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Henry Yu
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom because her old phone broke. The battery lasts for days without charging! The phone actually arrived a few days before the estimated delivery date which is nice. Overall, the phone and buying experience is great. Would definitely buy from this seller again. Thank you!

Reviews.Title: beauty and function
Reviews.Author: Val August
Reviews.Content: The color of the phone is a beautiful pink. It is a long phone which I like. The only recommendation would be a full guide to be able to use all functions. Charge is good also. It lasts a long time.

Reviews.Title: Love Love Love It!!!!
Reviews.Author: YP
Reviews.Content: Screen is big, sound is big, digi buttons are big. My mother loves it!!! I would recommend to anybody, who wants to buy it for their mother or grandmother.

Reviews.Title: Connects perfectly with both our Xlink Gateway and the handsfree in our 2013 Subaru.
Reviews.Author: Furjaw
Reviews.Content: Unlike the Motorola Razr V3 that we returned, this one connects perfectly with both our Xlink Gateway and the handsfree in our 2013 Subaru.

Reviews.Title: Looks more shinier/glossier and stylish than on website.
Reviews.Author: Gonts
Reviews.Content: First impressions were "WOW"...An excellent gift it would make.  The glossy finish on the phone is extremely nice and makes this phone look beautiful. But functionally its an average phone and serves the basic purposes.When opened the battery panel, the panel cover looked thin and breakable. For the price paid, I dont expect wonders.

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone.
Reviews.Author: Eric M
Reviews.Content: Bought this for my mother, she loved it, it's simple and very easy to use.Good battery life, very solid, and nice looking.

Reviews.Title: Good phone
Reviews.Author: JJSHA
Reviews.Content: Good phone, very nice pretty color; However, I would definately prefer that the phone comes with screen protector on it.

Reviews.Title: great quality
Reviews.Author: chaostea "shopper"
Reviews.Content: got this phone for my elderly grandparents. they are very happy with the phone, very good quality and large screen and key

Reviews.Title: Beautiful phone.
Reviews.Author: Miranda Blue
Reviews.Content: It's a beautiful phone, but it was very hard to find a case for it, and I had to settle for a skin.
